task.title: How to Make Rich Vanilla Bean Ice Cream
task.shortdesc: Like the classics? This recipe is sweet and simple.

ul.li: 1 ¼ Cups of divided granulated sugar
1 Whole vanilla bean, halved and seeds scraped

context.note: Place freezer bowl in freezer at least 24 hours before intended use.

p.b: This recipe will make about 6 cups (12 ½ cup servings).

step.cmd: Heatthe milk, cream, half of the sugar, salt, and the scraped vanilla bean (pod included) in a medium saucepan on medium-low heat.
Whiskto combine the ingredients and bring mixture just to a boil.
Combinethe egg yolks and sugar in a separate medium bowl while the mixture is heating. Using a hand mixture (on low) or whisk, beatthe eggs and sugar until it is pale and thick.

Whisk1/3 of hot mixture into the yolk and sugar mix once it has come to a boil. Addanother 1/3 and place in saucepan. Stirmixture constantly (with a wooden spoon) on low heat. Once it thickens slightly, turn off heat.

info.note: Mixture should not come to a complete boil.

step.cmd: Coverand refrigeratefor at least 2 hours/overnight, once the base mixture has returned to room temperature.
Pourmixture through strainer and discard vanilla pod before churning.
